name: @diazstg/memory-bank-mcp
description: MCP Server for managing Memory Bank with remote server support

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun build src/index.ts --outdir build --target node
scripts.build:start: bun run build && bun run start
scripts.build:ext: cd vscode-extension && npm run compile && npm run package
scripts.release:ext: bash -c 'set -e; BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [ "$BRANCH" != "main" ]; then echo "ERROR: release:ext must be run from main (current: $BRANCH)"; exit 1; fi; cd vscode-extension; VER=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version"); echo "Building vscode-extension v$VER..."; npm run compile; npx @vscode/vsce package --no-dependencies; echo "Tagging vscode-v$VER..."; cd ..; git tag "vscode-v$VER"; git push origin "vscode-v$VER"; echo "Done â€” workflow will create GitHub Release with .vsix"'

author: Daniel Diaz Santiago (diaz3618)
